1055:3: uktaṃ hi bhagavatā- trīṇīmāni saṃskṛtasya saṃskṛtalakṣaṇāni |
1055:7: na ca avidyamānasya kharaviṣāṇa syeva jātyādilakṣaṇamasti |
1055:16: iyaṃ ca utpādasthitibhaṅgasamāhārasvabhāva- sarvasaṃskṛtāvyabhicāriṇīti kṛtvā yadi utpādaḥ saṃskṛta iti parikalpyate,
1055:24: api ca | ime utpādādayaḥ saṃskṛtasya lakṣaṇatvena parikalpyamānā vyastā vā pṛthagvā lakṣaṇatvena parikalpyeran,
1055:30: yadi utpādakāle sthitibhaṅgau na syātāṃ tadā sthitibhaṅgarahitasya ākāśasyeva saṃskṛtalakṣaṇatvenānupapadya evotpādaḥ |
1055:33: utpādabhaṅgarahitaśca padārtho nāstyeveti na asyāvidyamānasya khapuṣpavat sthitiryujyate |
1055:37: atha syāt- pūrvaṃ śāśvato bhūtvā paścādaśāśvata iti,
1055:38: na caikapadārthaḥ śāśvataścāśāśvataśca yukta iti notpādabhaṅgarahitasya sthitiḥ |
1055:39: tathā yadi bhaṅgakāle sthityutpādau na syātām,
1055:41: evaṃ tāvadutpādādayo vyastā nālaṃ lakṣaṇakarmaṇi nālaṃ na paryāptā ityarthaḥ ||
1055:42: idānīṃ samastā api na yujyanta ityāha -
1055:49: tasminneva tiṣṭhati vinaśyati ceti kaḥ sacetāḥ pratipadyeta?
1055:50: tasmātsamastānāmapi utpādādīnāṃ saṃskṛtasya lakṣaṇakarmaṇi nāsti sāmarthyam ||2||
1055:52: tena yadi utpādādīnāṃ trilakṣaṇī prāptā prasaktā,
1055:57: asti cedanavasthaivaṃ nāsti cette na saṃskṛtāḥ ||3||
1055:58: nanu ca pakṣadvaye'pi vihita eva doṣaḥ,
1055:68: kiṃ pūrvaṃ syād yata uttarakālamaparaṃ bhavediti vyavasthābhāvādasaṃbhava evaṃ utpādādīnāmityabhiprāyaḥ |
1055:71: nāsti cette na saṃskṛtā iti gatārthametat ||3||
1055:75: yasmādiha saṃskṛtadharmaḥ kuśalaḥ kliṣṭo vā utpadyamānaḥ ātmanā pañcadaśaḥ utpadyate |
1055:76: sa dharmastasya cotpādaḥ samanvāgamaḥ sthitirjarā anityatā |
1055:85: idānīmutpāda syāpara utpādaḥ yāvadanairyāṇikatānairyāṇikatetyeṣa parivārasya parivāraḥ |
1055:86: tatra yo'yaṃ maula utpāda sa ātmānaṃ vihāya anyāṃścaturdaśa dharmān janayati |
1055:88: evaṃ yāvadanairyāṇikatā caturdaśa dharmān na niryāṇayati,
1055:100: taṃ cedānī mutpādopādākhyamutpādaṃ maula utpādo janayati |
1055:106: yadi tava utpādasyotpādo mūlotpādasya janaka iti matam,
1055:107: sa kathamidānīṃ maulenotpādenānutpāditaḥ san utpādotpādo maulaṃ janayiṣyati? ||5||
1055:108: atha manyase - utpādita eva maulenotpādena utpādotpādo maulaṃ janayiṣyati,
1055:110: sa te maulena janito maulaṃ janayate yadi |
1055:112: sa utpādotpādasaṃjñaka utpādo maulena janito yadi maulaṃ janayati,
1055:113: sa maula utpādotpāde nājanito'vidyamānaḥ kathamutpādotpādaṃ janayiṣyati?
1055:114: tasmānmaulena janitaḥ san utpādotpādo maulaṃ janayatīte na yujyate |
1055:115: tataśca parasparanirvartyanirvartakatvābhāvātsa eva anavasthāprasaṅga iti nāstyutpādaḥ||6||
1055:123: sa ca ajātaḥ kathamutpādayiṣyatīti na yuktamevaitadityabhiprāyaḥ evamutpādotpāde'pi vācyam ||7||
1055:124: atrāha - naiva hi utpādasyāpara utpādo'sti yato'navasthāprasaṅgaḥ syāt | kiṃ tarhi -
1055:129: ucyate | syādetadevaṃ yadi pradīpaḥ svaparātmānau saṃprakāśayet |
1055:132: kiṃ prakāśayati dīpaḥ prakāśo hi tamovadhaḥ ||9||
1055:133: iha prakāśo nāma tamasya ( so?) vadhaḥ |
1055:136: na cāpi pradīpo yatra deśe tiṣṭhati tatra tamo'sti,
1055:149: tadā anutpanne iva pradīpe utpanne'pi ghaṭādayo nopalabhyeran,
1055:154: notpadyamāno hi tamaḥ pradīpaḥ prāpnute yadā ||10||
1055:157: tadā kathaṃ kena prakāreṇedānīmutpadyamānena pradīpena tamo hatamiti yuktaṃ parikalpayitum?
1055:158: yasmācca evamutpadyamāna pradīpaḥ tamo na prāpnoti,
1055:160: atha manyase - yathā aprāptāmeva avidyāṃ jñānaṃ nihanti,
1055:161: aprāptameva rūpaṃ cakṣuḥ paśyati aprāptameva ayaḥ ayaskānto maṇirākarṣati,
1055:163: aprāpyaiva pradīpena yadi vā nihataṃ tamaḥ |
1055:167: ihastha eva pradīpaḥ sarvalokasthaṃ tamo nihaniṣyati,
1055:172: atha aprāptāvapi satyāmayaskāntamaṇiprabhṛtīnāṃ yogyadeśāvasthānāmeva svakāryakṛtvaṃ debhaviṣyatīti cet,
1055:174: aprāptau hi satyāṃ viprakṛṣṭadeśāntarāvasthitavadavyavahita śāntarāvasthita vacca aprāptatvād yogyadeśāvasthitānāmapi yogyadeśāvasthitatvaṃ na yuktamiti kuto yogyadeśāvasthitānāṃ svakāryakṛttvaṃ prasetsyati?
1055:176: yathā hi bhavān parikalpayati na tathā loke dṛṣṭam |
1055:177: yasmāt na lokaḥ prāptyaprāpticintāmevamādau viṣaye'vatārya pradīpādīnāṃ prakāśakatvādikaṃ kalpayati |
1055:178: yathoditaṃ tu vicāramanavatārya pradīpena tamo hatam,
1055:182: tattvavicārakāle tu lokasyāprāmāṇyānna tena bādhā śakyate kartum |
1055:187: yadyapi ceyaṃ prāptyaprāptyādicintā laukikavyavahāre nāvataratīti nirupapattikatvena mṛṣārtha tvādasya,
1055:190: yadi ca svaparātmānau pradīpaḥ prakāśayatīti parikalpyate tvayā,
1055:191: tamaso'pi tarhi pratipakṣa bhūtasya svaparātmanoḥ pracchādanaṃ prakalpyatamityāha -
1055:220: ubhayaṃ pi śūnyaṃ na ca kiṃ ca manyati ||
1055:225: jñānaṃ na kalpeti añānu no bhavet
1055:234: athotpanno janayate jāte kiṃ janyate punaḥ ||13||
1055:240: idānīṃ paramapi yathā notpādayati tathā pratipādayannāha -
1055:258: tataśca utpanna utpadyate ityucyamāne atītavartamānayorekakālatā syāt |
1055:266: tasmādutpattau satyāmutpattiṃ pratītya utpadyamānasiddheḥ utpadyamāna mevotpadyate,
1055:273: viśeṣata etadvaktavyaṃ syāt - asyotpattiṃ pratītya idaṃ nāmotpadyamānaṃ bhavatīti |
1055:275: na hi tadutpadyamānaṃ viśeṣato nirdhārayituṃ śakyate idaṃ tadutpadyamānamiti,
1055:282: yo hi nāma bhavāṃstathāgatapravacanavyākhyānavyājena dūṣaṇamātrakauśalamevātmanaḥ prakaṭayan paramarṣigaditamidaṃ pratyayatāpratītyasamutpādalakṣaṇaṃ paramārthasatyaṃ tathāgatānāṃ nihanti |
1055:283: iha bhagavatā tathāgatena prakṛtīśvarasvabhāvakālāṇunārāyaṇajaiminikaṇādakapilāditīrthakarakartṛvādanirāsena sarvabhāvānāṃ tattva mādarśitam,
1055:286: yaduta avidyāpratyayāḥ saṃskārāḥ ityādyaviparītaṃ pratītyasamutpādaṃ prakaṭayatā |
1055:287: tasya ca tvayā notpadyamānaṃ notpannaṃ nānutpannamityādinā dūṣaṇaṃ vidadhatā tathāgatajananyāḥ pratītyasamutpattimāturvadha evācarita ityalaṃ bhavatā sarvanāstikena tvayeti |
1055:290: bhavāneva tu paramagambhīrapratītyasamutpādādhimuktivirahādviparītaṃ tadarthamavadhārya asmākameva adhilayaṃ karoti |
1055:291: nanu ca idaṃ pratītyedaṃ bhavatītyevamabhidhānena bhagavatā tathāgatena niḥsvabhāvatvameva sarvadharmāṇāṃ spaṣṭamāveditam | yasmāt -
1055:293: yo hi padārtho vidyamānaḥ sa sasvabhāvaḥ svenātmanā svaṃ svabhāvamanapāyinaṃ bimarti |
1055:296: iti kṛtvā sasvabhāvabhāvābhyupagame sati kutaḥ pratītyasamutpāda iti bhavateva sasvabhāvatāṃ bhāvānāmabhyupagacchatā sarvathā pratītyasamutpāda eva bādhito bhavati |
1055:297: tataśca paramadharmabuddhadarśanamapi bādhitaṃ bhavati - yaḥ pratītyasamutpādaṃ paśyati sa dharmaṃ paśyati,
1055:298: yo dharmaṃ paśyati sa buddhaṃ paśyatītyāgamāt |
1055:299: mayā tu yatpratītya bījākhyaṃ kāraṇaṃ yadbhavatyaṅkurākhyaṃ kāryam,
1055:300: tacca ubhayamapi śāntaṃ svabhāvavirahitaṃ pratītyasamutpannaṃ pratipādayatā sarvathā bhagavatāṃ tathāgatānāṃ pratītyasamutpattimātā dyotitā bhavati | yata evam -
1055:308: tathā hi ghaṭotpattiṃ pratītya ghaṭa utpadyamāno bhavati,
1055:312: utpadyeta sa kiṃ tasmin bhāva utpadyate'sati ||17||
1055:313: yadi kaścidanutpannaḥ utpādātpūrvaṃ ghaṭo nāma kkacitsaṃvidyeta,
1055:314: sa utpattikriyāṃ pratītyotpadyeta na caivaṃ kaścidutpādātpūrvaṃ kkacidasti |
1055:321: tadā vartamānī bhūto bhāvo ghaṭākhyāṃ pratilabheta |
1055:328: yadi paṭa utpadyamānaḥ sa kathamutpannaḥ san ghaṭo bhaviṣyatīti atha naivaṃ kiṃcit,
1055:330: kathaṃ vā sa utpannaḥ san ghaṭo bhavet?
1055:333: api ca | evaṃ na yujyamānāyāmapyutpadyamānasyotpattau bhavato matamabhyupetyocyate -
1055:337: idaṃ tu vaktavyam- tamidānīmutpādaḥ katamo'paraḥ utpādamutpādayiṣyatīti ||18||
1055:338: atha syāt- utpādasyāpara utpādaḥ utpādakaḥ parikalpyeta,
1055:343: nanvevaṃ sati vinā utpādena utpāda utpadyate ityevaṃ prāpnoti |
1055:344: tataśca utpādotpādyānāmapi padārthānāṃ vinaivotpādena utpattirastu bhāvatvādutpādavaditi pratipādayannāha -
1055:347: api ca | utpāda ātmānaṃ parāṃścotpādayatītyatra pakṣe dūṣaṇameva na vaktavyamadhunāsmābhiḥ |
1055:353: na sannāsanna sadasan dharmo nirvartate yadā |
1055:356: svaparātmānau vā utpādayatītyasyāḥ kalpanāyā nāstyevāvatāra iti kuta etatprasetsyati -
1055:360: kiṃ cānyat - ihāyamutpādaḥ parikalpyamānaḥ nirudhyamānasya anityatānugatasya vartamānasya vā bhāvasya parikalpyate,
1055:366: anirudhyamānasyāpi vināśarahitasya atītānāgatasya bhāvalakṣaṇavilakṣaṇasya khapuṣpasyeva nāstyutpāda iti ||21||
1055:367: evaṃ bhāvānāmutpādābhāvaṃ pratipādya ataḥ paraṃ sthitirvicāryate ||
1055:382: tatra sthitaṃ na tiṣṭhati tatra sthitikriyānirodhāt |
1055:387: ihotpādapratiṣedhātko'sāvanutpannaḥ padārtho yastiṣṭhediti sarvathā nāsti sthitiḥ ||22||
1055:388: api ca | iyaṃ sthitirnirudhyamānasya bhāvasya syādanirudhyamānasya vā?
1055:389: ubhayathā ca na yujyate iti pratipādayannāha -
1055:392: nirudhyamānasya nirodhābhimukhasya tāvadbhāvasya virodhinī sthitirna saṃbhavati |
1055:393: yaścāpya nirudhyamānaḥ sa bhāva eva na bhavati,
1055:395: api ca | jarasā maraṇena ca sarva eva bhāvāḥ kṣaṇamapi na tyajyante |
1055:396: yadā caitadevam tadā jarāmaraṇavirodhinyāḥ sthiterbhāveṣu pravṛttyavakāśa eva nāstīti pratipādayannāha -
1055:398: tiṣṭhanti katame bhāvā ye jarāmaraṇaṃ vinā ||24||
1055:399: ke hi nāma jarāmaraṇarahitā bhāvā yeṣāṃ sthitiḥ syāt?
1055:401: yadi ca, asyāḥ sthiteranyā vā sthitiḥ sthityarthaṃ parikalpyeta,
1055:404: sthityānyayā sthiteḥ sthānaṃ tayaiva ca na yujyate |
1055:407: ' ityādinā yathā utpāda ātmānaṃ na janayati ityuktam,
1055:418: asthitā hi ime dharmāḥ sthitiścaiṣāṃ na vidyate |
1055:441: sā niruddhasya bhāvasya aniruddhasya vā nirudhyamānasya vā syāt |
1055:442: tatra niruddhaṃ nirudhyate iti na yuktam ,
1055:447: tathāpi nirudhyamānaṃ na nirudhyate ityanena saṃbandhaḥ |
1055:451: tasmānnāstyeva nirodha iti kutastatsahacāristhityutpādasaṃbhavaḥ syāt? api ca |
1055:454: api ca | ayaṃ nirodhaḥ sthitasya vā bhāvasya syādasthitasya vā?
1055:461: kiṃ cānyat | yadi iha nirodhaḥ syāt,
1055:462: sa tayaivāvasthayā tasyā evāvasthāyāḥ syādanyayā vā anyasyā avasthāyāḥ syāt |
1055:466: tayaiva tāvatkṣīrāvasthayā saiva kṣīrāvasthā na nirudhyate,
1055:478: anyayā vā avasthayā anyāvasthā na nirudhyate,
1055:488: api ca | nirodho nāma yadi kaścit syāt,
1055:489: sa sato vā bhāvasya syādasato vā | tatra -
1055:491: svabhāvādapracyutasya bhāvasya nirodho na yuktaḥ | yasmāt -
1055:496: tataśca sato bhāvasya nirodha iti bruvatā bhāvābhāvayorekādhikaraṇatā abhyupagatā bhavati |
1055:503: tasmādekatve sati bhāvābhāvayoḥ sa padārtho naiva bhāvo nāpyabhāva iti yujyate |
1055:504: athavā, parasparaviruddhatvādālokāndhakāra vadekatve sati na hi bhāvaśca nābhāvaścopapadyate |
1055:505: evaṃ tāvatsato bhāvasya nirodho na yuktaḥ ||30||
1055:512: tadevamasato bhāvasya nirodho na saṃbhavati, sato'pi na |
1055:516: kiṃ cānyat | yadi nirodho nāma bhāvānāṃ nirodhaka iti kalpyate,
1055:517: tasyedānīṃ kimanyo nirodha iṣyate, uta na?
1055:519: na svātmanā nirodho'sti nirodho na parātmanā |
1055:528: atha naṣṭo nāśayati naṣṭe kiṃ nāśyate punaḥ ||
1055:532: katham? tatra yathā utpāde gaditam - ' anya utpādayatyenam' ityādi,
1055:535: athāvināśo naṣṭo'yaṃ sarvaṃ naśyatu te tathā ||
1055:536: iti | tadevaṃ parātmanāpi nirodho na saṃbhavatīti nāsti nirodhasya nirodhaḥ ||
1055:537: atha manyase - nāstyeva nirodhasya nirodha iti,
1055:539: yadi hi nirodhasya nirodho na syāta,
1055:541: tadevaṃ yadi vināśasya vināśaḥ parikalpyate tathāpi na yukto vināśaḥ |
1055:545: atha syāt - tathāpi evameva vicāre sati vināśo bhavato'pi na yujyate,
1055:552: te ca niḥsvabhāvā eva santo bālānāmidaṃsatyābhiniveśināṃ vyavahārapathamupayānti avicāraprasiddhenaiva nyāyeneti teṣu nāsti yathoditavicārāvatāro'smākam māyāsvapnagandharvanagarādivattu laukikāḥ padārthā nirupapattikā eva santaḥ sarvalokasyāvidyātimiropahatamatinayanasya prasiddhimupagatā iti parasparāpekṣayaiva kevalaṃ prasiddhimupagatā bālairabhyupagamyante |
1055:564: kuto vināśarahitānāṃ saṃskṛtatvamapīti sarvameva asamañjasaṃ tasya jāyate |
1055:565: jātipratyayaṃ jarāmaraṇaṃ saṃskṛtalakṣaṇānāṃ ca saṃskāraskandhāntarbhāva varṇayatā bhagavatā nanu sahetukatvaṃ spaṣṭamādarśitaṃ vināśasya |
1055:566: jātimātrāpekṣatvāccāsya kṣaṇabhaṅgo'pi sukhasādhya iti sarvaṃ susthaṃ jāyate ||
1055:567: atha syāt - vināśo hi nāma abhāvaḥ,
1055:573: yaśca vidyamānaḥ tasya ca kiṃ hetunā prayojanam?
1055:576: api ca | yathā utpādaḥ sahetukaḥ pūrvamabhāvātpaścācca bhāvāt,
1055:580: yaccocyate - yaścābhāvaḥ tasya kiṃ hetunā kartavyamiti,
1055:583: kiṃ tarhi vināśa eva kriyate iti varṇayāmaḥ |
1055:584: nanvevaṃ sati kriyamāṇatvādvināśo'pi bhāvaḥ prāpnotīti cet,
1055:591: cetyāgamāt kathaṃ na sahetuko vināśaḥ? api ca |
1055:592: kalpitābhāvalakṣaṇāyāśca śūnyatāyāḥ pareṇa bhāvarūpatāmabhyupagacchatā kathamabhāvasya bhāvatvaṃ nābhyupagataṃ bhavati?
1055:597: na saṃskṛtaṃ hi nirvāṇaṃ bhāvābhāvau ca saṃskṛtau ||
1055:602: tathāhi kāṭhinyādikaṃ sāsnādikaṃ ca tasya viśeṣalakṣaṇamupadiśyate |
1055:608: yadā yathoktena nyāyena utpādasthitibhaṅgā eva niṣiddhāḥ,
1055:626: yathā māyā yathā svapno gandharvanagaraṃ yathā |
1055:628: yathā māyādayaḥ svabhāvenānutpannā avidyamānā māyādiśabdavācyā māyādivijñānagamyāśca lokasya,
1055:629: evamete'pi lokaprasiddhimātreṇa utpādādayaḥ svabhāvena avidyamānā api bhagavatā tathāvidhavineyajanānugrahacikīrṣuṇā nirdiṣṭā iti |
1055:636: sā putra jātaṃ ca mṛtaṃ ca paśyati |
